data.caption: Clarification On Significant Movement In Price
data.news_body: Please find enclosed clarification letter on significant movement in price of shares of the Company.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Vibhor Steel Tubes Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Vibhor Steel Tubes Ltd on March 21 2025 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.
